1079780.name: Dark Space Conqueror
1079780.description:
Conquer or you will be defeated! Welcome to Dark Space Conqueror, an epic combat strategy game in which your strategy and robots strength will define your destiny over the fight against other commanders. Attack planets to obtain resources or destroy the army of hundreds rebels, all while you explore and unlock the secrets of this beautiful universe.

All regarding the enormous power of the mysterious zero energy!.
1079780.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
